items.title: Alpaca Paper Trading + ODA Universe Scanner
items.notes: Connect Alpaca API/MCP. Build 3-tier universe scanner (Tier 1: 50 liquid, Tier 2: ~25 dynamic CES-E ≥70, Tier 3: discipline overlay). Integrate with ODA permission stack. Paper trade to validate options selection logic.

items.title: Expand scanner stock universe
items.notes: Current universe is ~100 stocks. Expand to 500+ by adding: Russell 2000 high-volume, sector ETFs, IPOs from past 2 years, earnings movers. Goal: more opportunities for RSI reversion bot.

items.title: Weight thesis stocks in scanner
items.notes: Combine scanner score with thesis alignment. Thesis stocks (critical minerals, space) get score boost. Keep best of both: high win-rate + conviction plays.

items.title: Multi-strategy tracking for Alpaca bot
items.notes: Add virtual portfolio tracking to tag trades by strategy (rsi_reversion, momentum, gap_fill, etc). Track PnL per strategy while using single paper account. Enables A/B testing different approaches.

items.title: IBKR-trader skill for live trading
items.notes: ClawHub skill: ibkr-trader by FlokieW. Interactive Brokers API integration with automated 2FA/IBeam login. Bookmark for when graduating from Alpaca paper trading to real money. Security audit needed before install.

items.title: ODA Options Execution Bot
items.notes: Alpaca doesn't support options. Need separate execution layer for ODA signals. Candidates: Tradier (best options API), TD/Schwab, IBKR, Tastytrade. Build after ODA paper trading validates (post-Mar 7 decision gate).

items.title: RL Execution Optimizer (Gym + PPO)
items.notes: Use reinforcement learning (PPO via stable-baselines3) to optimize execution decisions — hold times, exit timing, stop logic — on top of existing signals (GEX, momentum, RSI). NOT for entry signals. Requires 12+ months validated trade data first. Custom Gym environment with proprietary state space (GEX level, VIX slope, overnight gap %). Target: Q3 2026 earliest. Source: RL Trading Strategy video research (Feb 11, 2026).

items.title: Compass: Hard-Gate Options Screener (Reddit reference)
items.notes: Reddit post: S&P 500 options screener using hard gates (IV, HV, liquidity, earnings) → scoring with sector concentration penalty → Claude/GPT parallel explanation → auto-builds iron condors, credit spreads, straddles. 30-45 DTE. Next.js + Tastytrade + Finnhub. Reference for Compass ODA bot build. URL: https://www.reddit.com/r/ClaudeAI/comments/1r35gpb/

items.title: Fractional Differentiation for Feature Pipelines
items.notes: López de Prado AFML technique #5. Differentiate price series by fraction d (e.g. 0.4) instead of integer — preserves ~90% of memory/trend while achieving stationarity. Better ML features than standard returns or raw prices. Module built: src/ml/fracdiff.py (find_min_d, frac_diff_ffd). Integration needed: wire into FeaturePipeline for all strategies, auto-detect optimal d per ticker, replace standard differencing in model inputs.

items.title: Confidence-Based Bet Sizing (Meta-Model → Position Size)
items.notes: López de Prado AFML technique #6. Map meta-model probability to position size: b = 2Φ(z[p]) - 1. Replaces fixed $10K sizing with confidence-scaled sizing. Function built in src/ml/meta_labeling.py (bet_size). Integration needed: wire into portfolio allocator so high-conviction trades get larger positions and low-conviction get smaller. Requires working meta-labeler first (Daybreak pipeline accumulating data). Estimated 15-25% improvement in risk-adjusted returns.
